de_BE {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "Fr",
            "BEF ",
            ",",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "German locale for Belgium" }
        Source { "RAP" }
        Address { "Sankt J\u00F8rgens Alle 8, DK-1615 K\u00F8benhavn V, Danmark" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "German" }
        Territory { "Belgium" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "1.0" }
        Date { "2000-06-29" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[jJyY].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            ".",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4 #,##0.00;\u00A4- #,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "32" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy  z",
                    "EEE dd MMM yyyy hh:mm:ss z",
                    "yyyy-MMMM-dd",
                    "yyyy-MMMM-dd",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Son",
                            "Mon",
                            "Die",
                            "Mit",
                            "Don",
                            "Fre",
                            "Sam",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Sonntag",
                            "Montag",
                            "Dienstag",
                            "Mittwoch",
                            "Donnerstag",
                            "Freitag",
                            "Samstag",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Jan",
                            "Feb",
                            "M\u00E4r",
                            "Apr",
                            "Mai",
                            "Jun",
                            "Jul",
                            "Aug",
                            "Sep",
                            "Okt",
                            "Nov",
                            "Dez",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Januar",
                            "Februar",
                            "M\u00E4rz",
                            "April",
                            "Mai",
                            "Juni",
                            "Juli",
                            "August",
                            "September",
                            "Oktober",
                            "November",
                            "Dezember",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
